name: World of Warships: Legends – Torpedo Specialist
name_original: World of Warships: Legends – Torpedo Specialist
description:
T-61 is a Tier V destroyer that can do almost anything! Her torpedoes and guns both reload quickly, and she is nimble! Being such a good all-rounder makes T-61 ready to handle any situation!

Comes with: - T-61 - 3 days of Premium Account - 10x common boosters of every type (total 50) - BONUS: 10x Type 4 Camos - 37,000 Commander XP

If you already have T-61 in your Port, you will receive compensation in the form of 10,000 doubloons. Content such as boosters, Commander XP, camouflages, etc. is only visible upon reaching a specific account level in the game.
